originalText.text: I had fractured my distal femur … my local doctor did surgery but after 3months he referred me to Dr David L Helfet because I had a “non-Union” & my orthopedic surgeon said he was the only orthopedist who could repair my situation & he did just that including a cadaver  femur bone & lots of hardware ! Everything has been perfect for me from his surgical team who did the surgery ! I am so grateful that my local orthopedist referred me to him!

text.text: I had fractured my distal femur … my local doctor did surgery but after 3months he referred me to Dr David L Helfet because I had a “non-Union” & my orthopedic surgeon said he was the only orthopedist who could repair my situation & he did just that including a cadaver  femur bone & lots of hardware ! Everything has been perfect for me from his surgical team who did the surgery ! I am so grateful that my local orthopedist referred me to him!

originalText.text: Dr. Helfet saved my elbow/arm after a previous hospital failed to respond competently to a life-threatening infection from my initial surgery.  Dr. Helfet immediately knew what to do -- replace the infected hardware and administer IV antibiotics.  When the elbow healed, he removed the hardware, sent me to physical therapy, and now my previously broken and infected elbow is as good as new.  The whole team at Hospital for Special Surgery was competent, proactive, and reassuring toward my family and me during this upsetting time.  I'm playing piano and doing pushups now thanks to Dr. Helfet!

originalText.text: So much of one's experience with a doctor depends on the staff across the practice.  Dr. Helfet's own caring is reflected in the kind and efficient people who work with him.  The atmosphere of his office is calm and welcoming.  I had a complex knee fracture that one orthopedist said simply could not be repaired.  Another thought maybe, but no promises.  Dr. Helfet undertook the delicate surgery and fixed the knee beautifully.  His aftercare was equally thorough and reassuring.  His staff then intervened to get me almost unlimited physical therapy, and convinced my insurer to dramatically lower my out-of-pocket expense.  The shattered knee was a real trauma, but Helfet and his office healed me both physically and mentally.

originalText.text: Dr. Helfet is an amazing surgeon, beyond words. His extremely impressive bio speaks for itself. He is a very humble man, which proves his statue.After 4+ years of severe pain, waiting for approval from workers compensation insurance, my hip surgery made me feel so relieved. On subsequent visits, seeing Dr. Helfet and his amazing physicans assistant were a pleasure. Not even mind the drive into the city. HSS and Dr. Helfet erte well worth the trip. I wouldn't even consider going anywhere else. I can't thank Dr. Helfet enough.

originalText.text: I was pregnant with twins and had a very complicated issue that required surgery while pregnant. He was the only doctor able to do the surgery without radiation that could harm the babies. He literally saved my life and the babies and I’m incredibly indebted to this surgeon. Not only is he a genius, he also had wonderful bedside manner and makes you feel safe even in the most vulnerable of circumstances. I highly recommend Dr Helfet.
